name: Righteous Condemnation
text: Any creature of chaotic, neutral, or evil alignment who targets you with a spell must succeed at a Will save or take a –4 penalty on Intelligence-, Wisdom-, and Charisma-based checks for the spell’s duration. Creatures with only neutral alignment components receive a +4 bonus on their Will saves against this spell. The penalties for alignment components stack (therefore, a chaotic evil spellcaster would take a –8 penalty).
text_zh: 任何以你的法术为目标的混乱、中立或邪恶阵营的生物都必须通过意志豁免，否则在法术持续时间内基于智力、感知和魅力的检定受到 –4 减值。 仅中立的生物在对抗此法术的意志豁免上获得 +4 加值。 阵营带来的减值会叠加（因此，混乱邪恶的目标会受到 –8减值）。
